name: Xanthide
description:
Iris has successfully infiltrated NXT's HQ.

Time to test out Dr. Green's newest invention, the Xanthide Matrix.

Controls:

     A/D or Left Right - Move

     Space - Jump

     Down or Left Ctrl - Turn invisible

Credits:

ProgrammerByBarxXComposerRob Burnley
ArtistAndy Bae

Made as a part of:

Weekly Game Jam 128 - Camouflage
